title: Privacy Policy — Aryan’s AI Assistant
consent_note: By continuing to use and interact with this website (including the chatbot and Spotify features), you acknowledge and agree to this Privacy Policy.

collected_data.name: Chat Messages
collected_data.details: Your prompts and AI responses are processed to generate answers. Some interactions may be minimally logged for quality and abuse prevention.

collected_data.name: Spotify Integration
collected_data.details: If you connect Spotify, your access token is stored only in your browser (never on Aryan’s server). Search and previews go through a secure proxy.

collected_data.name: Usage Data
collected_data.details: Basic, aggregate analytics (e.g., visits, feature usage) may be collected to improve the experience.

usage: Provide accurate, helpful AI responses and core features.
Improve safety, reliability, and UX of the AI Assistant.
Enable Spotify search and audio previews when connected.
storage_security: Chat history persists locally in your browser and can be cleared any time.
Spotify tokens/preferences are kept in localStorage (client-side only).
All communications with APIs use HTTPS transport encryption.

in_chat: Use the chat header ‘Clear chat’ button at any time.

third_parties.name: Spotify
third_parties.note: Used for search and 30s previews when connected. Spotify’s own terms and privacy policy apply in addition to this page.

changes: This policy may be updated periodically. Significant changes will be announced on the AI Pages. Continued use after updates means acceptance.
